final_plan.description:
Task: Implement user login functionality
Task Description: Create user login API endpoint with authe...
functional_requirements: Create a POST API endpoint at /api/auth/login that accepts email and password.
Validate user credentials against the database.
Compare hashed password using bcrypt for authentication.
Return a JWT token containing user ID, email, and expiration time upon successful login.
Implement rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks.
Log failed login attempts for security monitoring.
Return appropriate error messages for invalid credentials.
Include comprehensive unit tests for various authentication scenarios.
Update API documentation with details of the /api/auth/login endpoint.

steps.title: Setup JWT authentication foundation
steps.description: Install dependencies and configure JWT infrastructure

sub_steps.title: Install jsonwebtoken and bcrypt libraries
sub_steps.description: Add JWT and password hashing libraries to package.json
sub_steps.test: Run npm install and verify jsonwebtoken and bcrypt are installed correctly

sub_steps.title: Create JWT utility functions
sub_steps.description: Implement signToken() and verifyToken() helper functions
sub_steps.test: Import and call signToken() with test payload, verify it returns valid JWT string

sub_steps.title: Add JWT_SECRET to environment config
sub_steps.description: Add JWT_SECRET variable to .env and config loader
sub_steps.test: Start application and verify JWT_SECRET is loaded correctly from environment

steps.title: Implement login API endpoint
steps.description: Create authentication endpoint with credential validation

sub_steps.title: Create auth router and login route
sub_steps.description: Setup POST /api/auth/login route with Express router
sub_steps.test: Send POST request to /api/auth/login and verify route is accessible (404 → 400/500)

sub_steps.title: Implement login controller logic
sub_steps.description: Create controller to validate credentials and generate JWT
sub_steps.test: Call login controller with test credentials and verify JWT token is generated

sub_steps.title: Add request validation middleware
sub_steps.description: Validate email format and password presence
sub_steps.test: Send invalid request (missing email/password) and verify 400 validation error

sub_steps.title: Implement rate limiting middleware
sub_steps.description: Add rate limiting to prevent brute force attacks on login
sub_steps.test: Send multiple requests to /api/auth/login and verify rate limit is enforced

sub_steps.title: Log failed login attempts
sub_steps.description: Implement logging for failed login attempts for security monitoring
sub_steps.test: Attempt login with invalid credentials and verify log entry is created

steps.title: Create unit tests for login functionality
steps.description: Write comprehensive unit tests for various authentication scenarios.

sub_steps.title: Test successful login scenario
sub_steps.description: Verify successful login returns JWT token and user data
sub_steps.test: Run test suite and verify successful login test passes

sub_steps.title: Test invalid credentials scenario
sub_steps.description: Verify handling of invalid email/password returns appropriate error
sub_steps.test: Run test suite and verify invalid credentials test passes

sub_steps.title: Test rate limiting scenario
sub_steps.description: Verify that rate limiting blocks further login attempts after threshold
sub_steps.test: Run test suite and verify rate limiting test passes

steps.title: Update API documentation
steps.description: Document the /api/auth/login endpoint in API documentation.

sub_steps.title: Update API documentation
sub_steps.description: Add details for /api/auth/login endpoint including request/response examples
sub_steps.test: Review docs to ensure /api/auth/login is documented correctly

execution_order: Within each step, execute sub-steps in order
Test after each sub-step before proceeding
Commit code after each completed sub-step
